{{also|tee|teè|têe}} ==English== ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # An Ogoni language spoken in [[Nigeria]]. ===See also=== * {{langcat|tkq}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=eet|EET}} {{topics|en|Languages}} ---- ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{bor|de|nan|茶|tr={{l|nan|tê}}}}. ====Pronunciation==== * {{IPA|de|/teː/|[tʰeː]}} * {{audio|de|De-Tee.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|eː}} ====Noun==== {{de-noun|m|Tees|Tees}} # [[tea]] {{gloss|drink made by infusing parts of a plant, especially leaves or buds of ''Camellia sinensis'', in water}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|s|s}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |Teebaum |Teebeutel |Teegeschäft |Teeglas |Teekanne |Teekessel |Teelöffel |Teesieb |Teetasse |Teewurst |Teezeit |Beuteltee |grüner Tee |schwarzer Tee |Darjeeling-Tee }} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|bor=1|nds-de|Tee}} ** {{desc|pdt|Tee}} * {{desc|bor=1|et|tee}} * {{desc|bor=1|hrx|Tee}} * {{desc|bor=1|dsb|tej}} * {{desc|bor=1|rm|te}}, {{l|rm|té}}, {{l|rm|tè}} * {{desc|bor=1|stq|Tee}} * {{desctree|bor=1|szl|tyj}} * {{desc|bor=1|sli|Tee}} * {{desc|bor=1|wym|tyy}} * {{desc|bor=1|gmw-zps|Tee}} ===Etymology 2=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|en|tee}}. ====Pronunciation==== * {{IPA|de|/tiː/|[tʰiː]}} * {{rhymes|de|iː}} ====Noun==== {{de-noun|n|Tees|Tees}} #
